results.title: Phoenix
results.creator_credit: Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: The Major Crime Task Force continues its investigation into the Hennessy family that it began in the series, “Janus”. Series created by Alison Nisselle and Tony McDonald.

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 19-20
results.creator_credit: Kate Woods, Julian McSwiney, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 19 and 20 in the television series Phoenix. Safe as Houses’: The Major Crime Squad and Criminal Intelligence lock horns over an informant, Carlos, who might have information about the identity of the two burglary suspects. When Peter and the boys find the safe house, they don’t realise Chris is in drug squad, nor that Peter’s wife is there staking him out.Aladdins Cave’: Peter interviews John Reece who was found at the safe house regarding the stolen property, although he does have a connection to the robberies, it doesn’t look likely that he is Betty’s rapist. The 6 stamps belonging to James Arthur are found in John Reece’s house and the majors find out that the burglaries are related to drug importation - a much bigger deal than what they first thought they were dealing with.

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 15-16
results.creator_credit: Kate Woods, Julian McSwiney, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 15 and 16 of the television series Phoenix. Deal or Play’: Due to the recession, aggravated assaults are increasing, especially against the older community. Ian from forensics is trying to match a soil sample from the boots the burglars were wearing at one of the aggravated assaults. The rolex watch that was stolen from Betty and James Arthur’s house turns up at a pawn shop so they desperately try to find the identity of who sold it.Married to the Job’: Chris Faithfull (Peter’s wife) is an undercover drug squad cop. She survives the harrowing experience of having a gun put to her head in an attempt to sniff out the big dealers. Carol and the drug squad hide out in a paddock where a young university student has set up an elaborate drug lab inside a caravan, unfortunately he is not as experienced as first thought as he manages to blow the caravan up, along with the evidence the drug squad needs to charge him.

results.title: Pickup on South Street = Pick up on South Street
results.creator_credit: Samuel Fuller, Jules Schermer and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Iconic film noir set in New York about a pickpocket who lifts microfilm bearing US secrets from the handbag of the former mistress of a Communist spy. Sam Fuller combines brisk pacing with sizzling dialogue to create a masterful political thriller that plays upon the over-ripe fears of Communism, espionage and political conspiracy. Richard Windmark plays a wonderfully amoral Skip McCoy, a freshly sprung jailbird, trying to play for all best angles, in an increasingly dangerous game he barely comprehends. Also stars the peerless Thelma Ritter as a street-wise grifter and Jean Peters as the louche femme fatale.
results.title_for_label: Pickup on South Street = Pick up on South Street

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 11-12
results.creator_credit: Kate Woods, Ian Gilmour, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 11 and 12 of the television series Phoenix Hair of the Dog’, opens with the scene of a body found in a river, the apparent cause of death a gun shot victim. Contrary to their first impressions, Ian from forensics discovers the victim died of a heroin overdose and things start moving again for the Majors. The upstairs brass decides to cut surveillance so the detectives start their own off duty surveillance, watching Nick’s house. The discovery of hair fibres found at the bombing reveals that a dog is connected to the robbers, all they need to do now is find the dog that connects Nick, the house and Dennis.Paradise Tomorrow’. Under continual pressure the bombers are beginning to make mistakes. Dennis screws up a robbery of a disposal store and his identity matches the majors sketch. While the garage is under surveillance Nick steals a car and takes it to there to have chassis numbers drilled out, just like the bomb car. The majors feel they are closing in.

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 09-10
results.creator_credit: Julian McSwiney, Michael Carson, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 9 and 10 of the television series Phoenix Shaking the Tree’. The team raids a known gay drug dealer in the hope of flushing out information about Dennis, the number 1 suspect, as they believe the dealer is scared of someone who has been harassing him and it might just be Dennis.Blessed are the Peace Makers’. Blazo is a member of the Special Operations Group who is brought into help the majors with their investigation. Blazo and Goose get on extremely well due to their interest with bombs, so Goose ends up going on an SOG exercise with Blazo and finds that he really is not as fit as he used to be.

results.title: Picasso: a painter's diary
results.creator_credit: Perry Miller Adato, Thirteen and WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.)
results.brief_description: Presents an overview of the life of Pablo Picasso, the main theme being that Picasso’s painting were his autobiography. Features photographs, documentary footage and interviews with friends and family of Picasso. Many of Picasso’s works are highlighted. Contains some B&W scenes. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 07-08
results.creator_credit: Kate Woods, Ian Gilmour, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 7 and 8 of the television series Phoenix. Old Rules New Games’. Jock is frustrated with the lack of hard evidence in the case so he goes to see his trusty informant (Bill Hunter), to see if he has any information as to who may have any of the left-over stolen explosives. He gets himself into deep trouble when he steals a car that has a baby asleep in the back and it’s left to Jock to see if he can get him out of strife.Fond Memories’. Megan believes the two suspects involved in the bombing are of a violent nature who would not flinch at attacking and raping anyone. On a hunch she investigates a rape case which uncovers a possible suspect that matches the behavior and patterns of the bomber. Dennis is now the number 1 suspect for the Major Crimes unit.

results.title: Picasso Peintre du Siecle = Picasso Artist of the Century
results.brief_description:
Profile of one of the most influential artist of the 20th century. Highlights includes the genesis of the famous painting ‘Guernica’.

Credits: Producer, Simon Schiffrin ; director, Lauro Venturi ; writer, Jean Leymarie ; photography, Jean Bourgoin ; music, Roman Vlad.
Cast: Alain Mottet [narration only].

results.title: Phoenix. Eps. 05-06
results.creator_credit: Julian McSwiney, Michael Carson, Bill Hughes and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Phoenix”.
Episodes 5 and 6 of the television series Phoenix Laz is still slowing earning the trust of his colleagues as he now believes Balcescu motors had something to do with drilling out the chassis number on the bomb car. Laz is sent through the door first on the ensuing raid, ending his days as an undercover cop for good. Forensic’s can find no link between the bombing and the garage. “Out of the Cold”. After realising that Martin’s Mine was robbed some months earlier, it becomes clear that the explosives used in the bombing came from the mine. On a night out to try and relieve some of the tension between Lochie, Laz, and Peter, Laz finds himself in strife when he protects his Senior Sergeant from the clutches of Francine, a transsexual with an eye for Lochie. He is sent for counselling to try and cope with his aggressive behavior, which in turn brings the team together for Laz has now won the boys trust.
